name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a classic box design and retro console buttons, Circuit brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Its rocket-like arms and legs allow it to navigate with agility, while its screen displays the classic game Snake. To complete its look, Circuit wears stylish glasses as an addon. With its unique blend of vintage aesthetics and modern functionality, Circuit is a beloved member of the WebtrES club.
